title: Can't use left shift on enum discriminants

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

body:
```
enum LLVMAttribute {                                                                                                                               
    LLVMExtAttribute = 1<<0
}
```
